segments.text: I notice the warm light from the window over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her apron, drying dishes meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the faucet still running, water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not reacting at all, just keeps wiping that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, the cookie jar is tempting the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that unstable stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so precarious, like it might collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, ready to catch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little adventure seems fun, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad thinking about a possible fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes stacked nearby could get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside makes the inside look even messier.
segments.speaker: PAR
